RT @iBooks: .@shondarhimes What was the most challenging thing to say ‚Äúyes‚Äù to? Was this the most transformative experience? https://t.co/y‚Ä¶
.@iBooks the lives of the people who work for me. I encourage them to shut off their phones after they leave the office and have a life.
.@iBooks my kids as a successful day. It has utterly changed my life and transformed my mood and my outlook. But it has also transformed...
.@iBooks who are used to striving and competing and succeeding. I have started to count the days where I spent some time playing with...
.@iBooks I had to teach myself to value having fun just as much as I value hard work. I think that is very important for those of us...
.@iBooks to face the way I was living my life the most. I had to truly fight my overachiever workaholic nature and learn to relax.
.@iBooks The most challenging thing to say yes to is play. It's the yes I wanted to do the most but it is also the yes that forced me....
